source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Forged Aspirant's Plate Headguard

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 782,457 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 311,829.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

transmog.display_string:

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 782,457 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 311,829.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 81 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

spells.description: Equip: Every 10 sec in combat take 1% of your maximum Health as Nature damage and gain a stack of Symbiosis, granting 251 Versatility for 20 sec  stacking up to 5 times.

Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have the chance to ignite your target with Radiant Focus for 15 sec. 

After dealing up to 1.9 million damage to the target, the focused energies ignite you with Radiance, granting between 1,422 to 2,845 of your highest secondary stat based on damage dealt for 15 sec.

name: Blastfurious Machete
description: The word 'Family' is etched into its hilt.

name: Frontman's Wondrous Wall
description: It's gonna be the one that saves you.
